name: Treasure Hunt - 3D
description:
My first 3D project in Unity! This was made for the course COMP 376 at Concordia University.

You've found a treasure trove of unlimited gems and gold! The only problem is the mysterious portal that spawns horrific demonic creatures from the depts of hell! Avoid them and grab as much loot as you can while minding your surroundings and your oxygen! Oh and there's Chicken that you can use as shark bait!

Controls:

WASD - Move/Swim

Spacebar - Jump/Rise (underwater)

C - Descend (underwater)

1 - Use star powerup (you'll have to find it first)
